entities.name: snape
entities.description: Snape is mentioned as someone who might be scared of Moody, and Harry has an impression that Snape is avoiding Moody's eye. ("I reckon Snape's a bit scared of him, you know," Harry said thoughtfully.)

entities.name: moody
entities.description: Moody is mentioned as someone who might be scary to others, and the Gryffindor students are looking forward to his first lesson. ("Imagine if Moody turned Snape in to a horned toad," said Ron)

entities.name: hermione

entities.name: harry
entities.description: Harry is mentioned as someone who finished Hermione's sentence for her and helped her get decent seats in class.
